title: WhatsApp for iOS to introduce revamped Contact Info page in future update
content:
WhatsApp for iOS is rolling out a new Contact Info page for public beta testers just a few months after doing the same with Business accounts.

description: WhatsApp is rolling out a new Contact Info page for public beta testers just a few months after doing the same with Business accounts.
